verses.text: \w An|strong="H0376"\w* eunuch, \w whose|strong="H0376"\w* testicles \w are|strong="H0376"\w* broken \w or|strong="H3808"\w* cut \w away|strong="H1540"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* yard cut \w off|strong="H1540"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* enter \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* church \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.

\w A|strong="H3772"\w* mamzer, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* say, \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w born|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* prostitute, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* church \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, until \w the|strong="H0935"\w* tenth generation.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* Ammonite \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Moabite, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* after \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* church \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever:

Because \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* meet \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w and|strong="H0935"\w* water \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H5704"\w*, \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt: hand because \w they|strong="H1992"\w* hired \w against|strong="H0935"\w* thee Balaam, \w the|strong="H0935"\w* son \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Beer, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Mesopotamia \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Syria, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* curse thee.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hear \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* turned \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w cursing|strong="H7043"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* thy blessing, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* loved thee.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H1293"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* prosperity all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* days \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy life \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* abhor \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Edomite, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* thy brother: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Egyptian, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* thou wast \w a|strong="H3808"\w* stranger \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w born|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* third generation \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* enter \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* church \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord.

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* thou goest \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* war \w against|strong="H0935"\w* thy enemies, thou shalt \w keep|strong="H0935"\w* thyself \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H1755"\w* evil thing.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* defiled \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* dream \w by|strong="H5921"\w* night, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H0935"\w*, \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* washed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* water \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w evening|strong="H3915"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* sunset \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w return|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

Thou shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* without \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* thou mayst \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* necessities \w of|strong="H4325"\w* nature,

Carrying \w a|strong="H1961"\w* paddle \w at|strong="H4264"\w* thy girdle. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* thou sittest \w down|strong="H3027"\w*, thou shalt dig round \w about|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* earth \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* dug \w up|strong="H1961"\w* thou shalt cover

\w That|strong="H1961"\w* which thou art eased \w of|strong="H3427"\w*: (\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord thy God walketh \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3427"\w* thy camp, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* deliver thee, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* thy enemies \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee:) \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* thy camp \w be|strong="H1961"\w* holy, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* no uncleanness appear therein, lest \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* servant \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w fled|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* dwell \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee ill \w the|strong="H0834"\w* place \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* please \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* rest, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* thy cities: give \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trouble.

\w There|strong="H3427"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* whore \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Israel, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* whoremonger \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Israel.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* offer \w the|strong="H1961"\w* hire \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* strumpet, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* price \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* dog, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, whatsoever \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* thou hast vowed: because both these \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* abomination \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lend \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thy brother \w money|strong="H0868"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* usury, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* corn, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H8441"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stranger. \w To|strong="H1697"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* thou shalt \w lend|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* wanteth, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* usury: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* bless thee \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy works \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt go \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* possess.

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w vow|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* delay \w to|strong="H0935"\w* pay \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* require \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou delay, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* imputed \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* sin.
\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w promise|strong="H3068"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w once|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H1961"\w* out \w of|strong="H3808"\w* thy lips, thou shalt observe, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* shalt do \w as|strong="H1961"\w* thou hast \w promised|strong="H5087"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* hast spoken \w with|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w own|strong="H1961"\w* mouth.

\w Going|strong="H4161"\w* \w into|strong="H4161"\w* thy neighbour’s vineyard, thou mayst eat \w as|strong="H0834"\w* many grapes \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thou pleasest: \w but|strong="H1696"\w* must \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* none \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w friend’s|strong="H7453"\w* corn, thou mayst break \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ears, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* rub \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* reap \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* sickle.
